all.name: Quick and Easy Green Beans
all.ingredients: trimmed green beans (12 ounces), water (1/4 cup), butter (1 tbsp.), salt (1/4 tsp.), black pepper (1/4 tsp.)

all.name: Simple Miso Soup
all.ingredients: water (3 cups), instant dashi granules (1 tsp.), miso paste (1 tbsp.), wakame seaweed (2 tbsp.), tofu (1/2 cup), green onions (3 tbsp.)

all.name: Olive Oil and Garlic Sauce
all.ingredients: olive oil (1/2 cup), garlic (6 cloves), salt, ground black pepper, minced fresh parsley (1/4 cup)

all.name: Spaghetti Pasta Carbonara
all.ingredients: olive oil (1 tbsp.), diced bacon (1/2 pound), minced garlic (1-2 cloves), eggs (3-4), grated parmesan (1 cup), spaghetti pasta (1 pound), salt, black pepper

all.name: Simplest Fruit Salad
all.ingredients: yoghurt (1 cup), honey (1 tbsp.), oranges (2), bananas (2), apple (1), poppy seeds (1 tsp.), sliced almonds (4 tbsp.)
